WordHunt

Solve a WordHunt board (Game Pigeon).

APP_HELP = “Solve a WordHunt board.” APP_OPTIONS = { “height”: “board height, default 4”, “width”: “board width, default 4”, “limit”: “max number of results, default 20” }

Option

Description

height

Board height. Default is 4.

width

Board width. Default is 4.

limit

Max number of results. Default is 20.

 
app: wordhunt
oatrihpshtnrenei

2, 2 - haptens
2, 2 - haptene
3, 2 - pterins
4, 2 - staithe
1, 3 - hennier
1, 3 - henners
2, 3 - tenners
2, 2 - hapten
3, 2 - pterin
4, 2 - sprint
4, 2 - sprent
4, 2 - staith
1, 3 - henner
2, 3 - tenner
3, 3 - niente
4, 3 - rennet
1, 4 - enters
4, 4 - inners
4, 4 - inters
2, 1 - apter
2, 2 - haith

The coordinates, ex. 2, 2, are board coordinates, starting at 1, 1 (not 0, 0). The results are sorted first by number of points, then by board position.
